name: vaccine-exercise
description: THL has ordered us to create a vaccination database which contains information about vaccine orders and vaccinations.

scripts.install:both: cd server && npm install --dev && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../
scripts.build:both: cd server && npm run tsc && cd ../client && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install:both && npm run build:both

author: Toni Naumanen
